rev.desc.rev.desc: SCR38624 - Task 35059: Corrected code to process master format control record when closing a call if there is no form specific format control. Modified panel decide.call.master.fc. Changed the following line:
not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc) and not null(name in $L.fc)
not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc) and not null($L.fc.master)
added panels that get the object record and the master format control record and then decide whether or not to call the master format control before calling the regular format control record.

descript.descript: SCR38624 - Task 35059: Corrected code to process master format control record when closing a call if there is no form specific format control. Modified panel decide.call.master.fc. Changed the following line:
not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc) and not null(name in $L.fc)
not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc) and not null($L.fc.master)
added panels that get the object record and the master format control record and then decide whether or not to call the master format control before calling the regular format control record.
